label.phrase: i had a contract with the state-owned film production company to produce the film but then the company was dissolved in october 1971 and i had to find another source of finance i formed my own company and sought help from algeria to finance the film when it was banned i was very depressed but fortunately it was not banned for long the experience taught me that even if a film is banned for a while eventually it will be released in the case of the sparrow the fact that the film was only released after the october war rather muted its message since it was a response to the 1967 defeat
